attributes.action: Be more sensible on the smoking ban and allow segregated rooms, and begin tackling REAL social problems such as drugs first!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is now time that the government reviewed its smoking policy(that is sending many businesses to the wall and refusing some smokers treatment on the NHS)They should begin to Allow limited smoking in pubs again(in segregated ares where staff and non smokers need never tread) in an environment where drinking can be better regulated by landlords, stop the sale of cheap alcohol in supermarkets where it cant be regulated as easily, and start to refuse treatment to drug addicts and violent patients instead of smokers or the slightly overweight(especially as i saw a heroin addict in hospital today where i work being "cautioned" by police for injecting into his drip feed)Get a grip on the real social problems of drugs(that ARE illegal) and alcohol abuse ( that is due to supermarkets irresponsible sales tactics) and stop penalising smokers for doing something that never makes them go out and be violent, and is still LEGAL last time i checked!
